description: Linen Clubs luxurious table runners with hemstitched detailing and slub textured effect, made from a lovely classic and soft 100% pure combed cotton. The more they are washed the softer they get. The right material for the runner is cotton, not polyester and cotton runners sport a better feel than linen table runners. The corners are sewn mitered for better shape and structure. The role pack runner is a great value and perfect for everyday use, family dinners, dinner parties, weddings or even a picnic!
